name: Power Bot (JTG)
description:
Power Bot is just a normal platformer game, but it has a limited life. Help the robot reach the goal! Collect batteries to charge and increase the robot's power. The game can be played in both mobile and PC. In PC, the controllers are: A/left arrow is going left, D/right arrow is going right, and W/up arrow is to jump.

Hope you like it and have fun! -JoshuaTNTGamer
